attributes.action: Limit the number of abortions for social reasons per person.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who want abortions for social reasons often claim that the unwanted pregnancy was an "accident". Surely after the first time, they have learned from their "mistake". From watching recent documentaries on abortion, it seems to me that no-one gets out of it without trauma. We need to have better sex education for the school age, but as much for adults who supposedly know better. I, personally, am against abortion in any case, but this would at least be better than it currently stands.
